title: DPG DCO Ads Campaign
description: This campaign was built for GPD Media’s 9 distinct brands, with each ad dynamically loading brand-specific content—including text, images, logos, and links—from a single, centralized feed, ensuring consistent branding across all brands, faster content updates without manual edits, and personalized messaging tailored to each audience and platform.

responsibilities.title: Animated HTML5 Ads
points: Animated HTML5 Ads: From concept to execution
Storyboard Ideation: Planning sequences and flows for engagement
Animation and Ad Design: Bringing visuals to life
HTML5 Ad Development: Coding and optimizing banners
Custom JS Components: Dynamic interactions and creative logic
Feed Implementation: Connecting the centralized content feed to ads

title: MediaMarkt DCO Ads Campaign
description: Dynamic Creative Optimization (DCO) ad campaigns use external data feeds to automatically update creative elements—such as images, text, and calls-to-action—in real time. This allows each user to see the most relevant and personalized ad content, improving engagement and performance while reducing manual production effort.
